question: The oviducts, uterus and vagina constitute the female ______ ducts.
Oviducts are also known as ______ tubes.
Each fallopian tube is about ______ cm long.
Each fallopian tube extends from the periphery of each ______ to the uterus.
The part of the fallopian tube closer to the ovary is called the ______.
The infundibulum is ______-shaped.
The edges of the infundibulum possess finger-like projections called ______.
Fimbriae help in collection of the ______ after ovulation.
The infundibulum leads to a wider part of the oviduct called the ______.
The last part of the oviduct is called the ______.
The isthmus has a ______ lumen and joins the uterus.
The uterus is ______ and is also called womb.
The shape of the uterus is like an ______ pear.
The uterus is supported by ligaments attached to the ______ wall.
The uterus opens into the vagina through a narrow ______.
The cavity of the cervix is called the ______ canal.
The cervical canal along with the vagina forms the ______ canal.
The wall of the uterus has ______ layers of tissue.
The outermost layer of the uterine wall is called the ______.
The middle layer of the uterus is called the ______.
The myometrium is a thick layer of ______ muscle.
The inner glandular layer of the uterus is called the ______.
The endometrium lines the ______ cavity.
The endometrium undergoes cyclical changes during the ______ cycle.
The ______ exhibits strong contractions during delivery of the baby.
The ______ canal along with vagina forms the birth canal.
The perimetrium is a thin ______ membrane.
The endometrium is the ______ layer of the uterus.
The myometrium is the ______ layer of the uterus.
The uterus opens into the vagina via a narrow structure called the ______.
The ______ helps in implantation and menstruation.
The ______ leads to the ampulla in the fallopian tube.
The ampulla lies between the infundibulum and the ______.
Fimbriae are located on the edges of the ______.
The uterus is also commonly referred to as the ______.
During delivery of the baby, the ______ layer contracts strongly.
The cervix and vagina together form the ______ canal.
The ______ attaches the uterus to the pelvic wall.
